column2: A cafe-factory where you can not only enjoy coffee but also observe chocolate production.
column5: A factory-cafe where you can sip your coffee in a pleasant working environment, surrounded by unique chocolate aromas. Inside this café, you can enjoy your coffee along with delicious sweets and chocolates. The café also features its own chocolate production facility. You can visit this facility at specified times, participate in the chocolate production workshop, and create your own chocolates.

column2: Türkiye's first cardboard factory (1957) is now Europe's largest coffee experience center.
column5: A coffee shop located in Istanbul, offering services in an area spanning over 6,000 square meters with more than 5 buildings and extensive green open spaces. Known for its delicious coffee, surpassing many coffee shops. This branch hosts numerous entertainment events.
